Blog.post: That's his job, that's what they pay him for Hauling rock back and forth in that big John Deere Fucking big, orange thing but..... I bring him Little Debbie snacks and he just, just loves those little peanut butter chocolate-raspberry-coated-icy-treats w/me in the truck With the cleavage in the truck He definately likes to fill my truck w/rock-ROCK She's back, ooh-wow, ooh-yeah, she's back, for some rock, she's back,for another load of rock And she's got those snacks in her car And she keeps bringing me treats, ooh, I wonder, and I wonder, if she likes me? But maybe she just likes my ROCK-just the ROCKS Or maybe my crushed gravel Don't go groveling on your gravel, never grovel on your gravel, Especially with the gravel pit man Who does it for a living, But you know he likes it because it's what he does and There's nothing else for him to do, Because there are no jobs in vermont except for................ Shoveling shit...gravel...whatever the fuck you're talking about, You know you can shovel it, Compost...trash...garbage...who knows? Who the fuck knows? I got a sticker on my truck but its expired, But they never look at it, cuz i got the cleavage going, And they never even ask me, It's been years since i got a new sticker, I just don't give a shit because it's only ten dollars I mean, So hey, I give 'em presents, I give 'em bread, I give 'em cardboard,I give 'em lead, i give 'em mercury, and all different sorts of things i bring down there all the time, And my simple presence should be enough, really, because i sing to the dumpman every wednesday, oh yeah, i do, That's what i do, I'm a dumpster girl

I'm a bum, sitting on a fence Watching my life go by Doesn't make any sense Not very lucky, haven't got too much dough Thoughts of suicide abound Insanity Row, what do i know I'm a bum, sitting on a fence Watching my world implode Makes me feel very tense I'm not very happy, why is life so tough Thought i had it all Every days too rough I'm a bum, sitting on a fence Watching my life go by Doesn't make any sense Well I'm a bum Well I'm a bum A fucking bum

I'M PROUD TO BE HIS CRAZY TIME GIRL THE MERE MENTION OF HIS NAME HAS ME IN A WHIRL I RUB HIS HEAD, I RUB HIS FEET I WATCH HIM SLEEP, WHEN HE'S SO BEAT HIS LIFE IS A MESS, HIS WIFES BAILIN' OUT HES SO SAD ABOUT HIS SON, HE'S FILLED WITH DOUBT I SAY DON'T WORRY, DON'T BE DEPRESSED I'LL MAKE YOU LAUGH, I'LL TRY MY BEST I'M SO PROUD TO BE HIS CRAZY TIME GIRL HE'S THE BEST MAN ALIVE, HE'S A GENUINE PEARL I COOK HIM DINNER, I RUB HIS NECK, I BRING HIM FLOWERS, BEAUTIFY HIS DECK HE'S AN ACE PHOTOMAN, HE'S A CYBER WIZARD HE'S AN AWESOME MUSICIAN, HE'S AN EX-BOX LIZARD I LOVE THAT MAN, I'LL NEVER STOP HE'S IN MY HEART, HE MAKES IT HOP I'M SO PROUD TO BE HIS CRAZY TIME GIRL THE MERE MENTION OF HIS NAME HAS ME IN A WHIRL I'LL HOLD HIM UP, WHEN THINGS GET ROUGH I'M A STRONG KINDA CHICK, I'M PRETTY TOUGH CRAZY TIME GIRL, IN A WHIRL..... CRAZY TIME GIRL, GOT ME IN A WHIRL...... CRAZY TIME GIRL.........CRAZY TIME GGGGGIIIIIIRRRRRLLLLLLL
Trying out a new site for journal. This is just a test post. I may use this journal to write silly songs. Who knows.

Best Friends for Life Kisses on the Rocks Sexual temptation Living in a box Why, oh why, can't I say goodbye Why can't I seem to let go Singing together Reading out aloud Video game playing Keeping out of crowds Why, oh why, can't I say goodbye Why can't I seem to let go Cuddling on the sofa Watching old TV Ask me why I stay Cuz it's where I wanna be Why, oh why, can't I say goodbye Why can't I seem to let go No-no-no, I can't let go No-no-no, I can't let go Don't ask me, I just don't know I can't let go
urlLink Sunny,notorious bass player of said band....Former CEO of an experimental artificial oxygen manufacturing plant called Nice Breeze Inc .
urlLink Suzawanda,newest vocalist/percussionist to LuvGash. Makes a habit out of visiting the men who work at the dump.

urlLink The Rev.Dr. Spyder X,another founding member of LuvGash, just before he had his underwear amputated. He was once arrested at a punk rock concert for making more noise than the band. Proceed with caution. You're mileage may vary. The Future has passed you by.
urlLink Chuck Wagon,one of the original members of Luv Gash. Now a lawyer in Tempe, AZ, His mission? Subvert the music scene there...
The band with an ever changing lineup,but the determination to make music fun again still remains.

Less than an hour old!!! Here's the latest release from the new and improved LuvGash... urlLink Insanity Row. If you enjoy this stuff,Please feel free to donate! Written by Suzawanda. Performed by LuvGash. Copyright LuvGash 2004
urlLink Jeffery Milkweed,former member of LuvGash stopped in to pay a visit. Haven't seen him in years. Gave his blessing on the new Dumpster Girl demo.Hopefully the video will be posted soon!

The latest demo featuring the vocal stylings of our new vocalist/percussionist,Suzawanda. urlLink Here it is!... If you're having problems running it,right click on the link and Save target to your desktop,then open. Hopefully, that will work. If not you will be forced to spend tons of money just to follow us around on tour, so that you can grovel at our feet, listening to our twisted tunes, and hoping to possibly be in the front row where you can feel the sweat drip off our brow. The lyrics can be found urlLink here. If you enjoy this stuff,Please feel free to donate! Written by Suzawanda. Performed by LuvGash. Copyright LuvGash 2004
urlLink Suzawanda was kind enough to translate and transcribe the lyrics to urlLink Dumpster Girl on her site, urlLink Our House. You can also find other LuvGash lyrics there as well
